comments.content: Change I8d6be22bb81658a39d5744d17427f71cd0e1b056 fixes this bug. Can be marked as fixed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ratailor

comments.content: This bug is fixed by https://review.openstack.org/#/c/284108/ patch, submitted by assignee. Can be marked as fixed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ratailor

comments.content:
As we use the "direct-release" model in Nova we don't use the
"fix comitted" status for merged bug fixes anymore. I'm setting
this manually to "fix-released" to be consistent.

[1] "[openstack-dev] [release][all] bugs will now close automatically
    when patches merge"; Doug Hellmann; 2015-12-07;
    http://lists.openstack.org/pipermail/openstack-dev/2015-December/081612.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
